matrix_N1_1.name: Wandering Aberrant
matrix_N1_1.description: It's been wandering since it escaped from the lab. Is the aberration due to experiments or Omnium radiation? No one knows.

set.2: Increase damage dealt by **4%**.

matrix_N2_1.name: Overheat
matrix_N2_1.description: The heat makes one squirm and want to vent by breaking things.

set.2: Reduce damage received by **4%**.

matrix_R1_1.name: Explosive Core
matrix_R1_1.description: The Omnium core burns bright within.

set.2: Increase damage dealt by flame weapons by **6%**.

matrix_R2_1.name: Hauler
matrix_R2_1.description: Back and forth, it shuttles between the mines and the track.

set.2: Increase damage dealt by frost weapons by **6%**.

matrix_R3_1.name: Standard Guard
matrix_R3_1.description: Being a good armed guard means protecting the thing you're guarding.

set.2: Increase damage dealt by volt weapons by **6%**.

matrix_R4_1.name: Provocateurs
matrix_R4_1.description: Ravagers that raise hell everywhere just because they have the might to do so.

set.2: Increase damage dealt by physical weapons by **6%**.

matrix_R6_1.name: Attack Analyzer
matrix_R6_1.description: Any fighting style has a weakness if you observe long enough.

set.2: Increase shatter by **18%**.
Reduce damage received by **6%**.

matrix_SR1_1.name: Robarg
matrix_SR1_1.description: Rooted in avarice and without an end in sight.

set.2: When a target is shattered, poison the target and deal damage equal to **45%**/56%/67.5% of ATK every second for 10 seconds.

matrix_SR2_1.name: Apophis
matrix_SR2_1.description: Huge in size, with every move causing great changes.

set.2: Deal higher damage at lower HP. Deal maximum damage when HP is **20%**. The damage can be increased by up to **20%**/25%/30%.

matrix_SR3_1.name: Frost Bot
matrix_SR3_1.description: It looks like food, indeed, but that doesn't mean you shouldn't be cautious.

set.2: When HP is below **40%**, using a discharge skill to switch to the current weapon restores HP equal to **160%**/200%/240% of ATK.

matrix_SR4_1.name: Sobek
matrix_SR4_1.description: Be careful not to get dragged into the mire it's in.

set.2: Increase damage dealt by **6%**/7.5%/9% for each enemy nearby. Up to 3 stacks.

matrix_SR5_1.name: Barbarossa
matrix_SR5_1.description: The two heads usually fight over who gets to kill the prey. A little instigation and the fight turns physical.

set.2: Upon switching to the weapon, gain **50%**/62.5%/75% damage reflection for **3** seconds. Cooldown: **30** seconds. Upon switching to another weapon, gain a **20%**/25%/30% damage boost for **5** seconds. Cooldown: **30** seconds.

matrix_SR6_1.name: Pepper
matrix_SR6_1.description: Who can explain to her that she has been toiling away for a long time now?

set.2: Increase speed of obtaining weapon charge by **10%**/12.5%/15%.
Increase ATK by **15%**/19%/22.5% when there are no enemies within 6 meters.

matrix_SR8_1.name: Ene
matrix_SR8_1.description: The accelerated output when power is increased will also be delivered in faint tremors to the weapon.

set.2: When dealing damage greater than **100%** of ATK, deal additional damage equal to **60%**/75%/90% of ATK. Cooldown: **3** seconds.

matrix_SR9_1.name: Bai Ling
matrix_SR9_1.description: What to do when you think about it and it spreads?

set.2: Increase damage dealt to grievous targets by **12%**/15%/18%.

matrix_SR12_1.name: Echo
matrix_SR12_1.description: A straight line of thought to completing the current goal.

set.2: Using a discharge skill to switch to the current weapon grants **80**/100/120 weapon charge.

matrix_SSR1_1.name: Meryl
matrix_SSR1_1.description: Complex swordfight simulation seemingly used for calibration. Anyway, not something for the average person.

set.2: If HP is less than **30%** after being attacked, gain a shield equal to **20%**/26%/32%/40% of Max HP for **10** seconds. Cooldown: **90** seconds.
set.4: Increase Whirlwind's damage by **36%**/45%/54%/63% and restore HP equal to **30%**/38%/44%/50% of the damage dealt while Whirlwind is active. The maximum HP restored every **0.5** seconds cannot exceed **60%**72%/81%/90% of ATK.

matrix_SSR2_1.name: Tsubasa
matrix_SSR2_1.description: "The wind blows." That sums up every cause for leaving and setting off again.

set.2: Increase damage dealt by **14%**/16%/18%/20% when there are no enemies within **4** meters.
set.4: Upon a headshot or hitting the target with Icewind Arrow: Piercing Shot, increase ATK by **15%**/18%/21%/25% for **8** seconds.

matrix_SSR3_1.name: Cocoritter
matrix_SSR3_1.description: The thoughts behind the creation of craft can also be applied on the battlefield.

set.2: Increase healing capability and healing received by **10%**/12%/14%/16%.
set.4: When you or your teammates are healed, increase ATK by **12.5%**/15%/17.5%/20% for **6** seconds. Only the highest level's effect is applied when obtained repeatedly.

matrix_SSR4_1.name: KING
matrix_SSR4_1.description: A good reputation still won't change the inability to get by with an empty wallet, so let's fill it up first and ask questions later.

set.2: When a target is shattered, grant **8%**/10%/12%/14% damage boost for **25** seconds. Only the highest level's effect is applied when obtained repeatedly.
set.4: If there are **2** or more enemies nearby, attacks restore HP equal to **14%**/18%/22%/26% of the damage dealt, up to **36%**/42%/48%/54% of ATK every **0.5** seconds.

matrix_SSR5_1.name: Cobalt-B
matrix_SSR5_1.description: It's as keen as forced static observation upon various planes, with some strong luck to boot.

set.2: Increase damage against debuffed targets by **14%**/16%/18%/20%.
set.4: Restore **1** dodge attempt every **3** dodges. Dodge skills inflict burn upon hit, dealing damage equal to **24%**/30%/36%/42% of ATK every 0.5 seconds for **4** seconds.

matrix_SSR6_1.name: Claudia
matrix_SSR6_1.description: First, learn to accept popular opinions, then make judgments about the issue at hand.

set.2: Increase damage by **13%**/17%/20%/23% when hitting a target in mid-air or initiating an aerial attack. Reset double-jump upon hitting the target in mid-air.
set.4: Hitting an enemy with a skill reduces the cooldowns of all weapon skills by **1.5**/2/2.5/3 seconds and increases the damage of discharge skills by **58%**/80%/103%/126% for **15** seconds.

matrix_SSR7_1.name: Shiro
matrix_SSR7_1.description: Like a wild cat, she is skittish toward others. Yet sometimes she'll sit by a pond and play with the water, wondering why she is so lonely.

set.2: Increase both damage and shatter to targets with more than **50%** HP by **15%**/19%/22.5%/26%.
set.4: Upon entering battle, gain a **20%**/25%/30%/35% damage boost for **35** seconds. Reset **5** seconds after exiting battle.

matrix_SSR8_1.name: Zero
matrix_SSR8_1.description: Break through logic, subvert reality, completely abandon formulas based on experience to arrive at the final result.

set.2: Upon using a discharge skill to switch to the current weapon, gain a shield equal to **150%**/200%/250%/300% of ATK for **6** seconds.
set.4: While the shield is active, you and your teammates deal **16%**/20%/24%/28% more damage.

matrix_SSR9_1.name: Samir
matrix_SSR9_1.description: If you said her jokes are corny, she would reply, "Why so serious?"

set.2: Increase damage progressively by **1%** upon hitting a target. Stack up to **10**/13/16/20 times. Lasts for **1.5** seconds.
set.4: Increase Dual EM Stars' electrical explosion damage by **16%**/22%/30%/40%.

matrix_SSR10_1.name: Huma
matrix_SSR10_1.description: It was the instinct to see the light that led the baby birds out of their shells.

set.2: Hitting targets with dodge skills inflicts bleed, dealing damage equal to **15%**/19%/22.5%/26% of ATK every second for **5** seconds.
set.4: Reduce ATK of all targets within **8** meters that are taking damage over time by **10%**/12%/13%/15%. Only the highest level's effect is applied when obtained repeatedly.

matrix_SSR11_1.name: Crow
matrix_SSR11_1.description: Some things are intangible but do truly exist.

set.2: Increase crit damage to targets with less than **60%** HP by **24%**/30%/36%/42%.
set.4: Crits deal additional damage over time every second equal to **18%**/22%/26%/30% of ATK for **5** seconds. This effect does not stack.

matrix_SSR12_1.name: Marc
matrix_SSR12_1.description: I'm the mightiest warrior and the people here need me.

set.2: Upon attacking an enemy, grant a shield to all teammates equal to **15%** of the user's current HP. Last for **15** seconds, and reset after leaving the battle for **10** seconds. Upon activation, this shield's value will combine with any other active HP shields. While shielding, there is an **11%**/13%/15%/17% damage reduction and lasts for **15** seconds. This effect cannot be stacked. This Matrix's effect is also active in the off-hand slot, but only the set with the highest star rating will take effect.
set.4: After gaining an HP Shield, increase ATK by **6%**/7.5%/9%/11.5% and increase the ATK of allies by **3%**/3.5%/4.5%/5.75% for **15** seconds. Stack up to **3** times. This Matrix's effect is also active in the off-hand slot, but only the set with the highest star rating will take effect.

matrix_SSR13_1.name: Bai Yuekui
matrix_SSR13_1.description: Have the courage to make mistakes in course of seeking scientific truth.

set.2: Upon switching to this weapon, if weapon charge is between **200** and **999**, consume **200** weapon charge to increase ATK by **15%**/18%/21%/25% for **15** seconds. **5**-second cooldown. This effect does not stack.
set.4: For every **0.6** seconds maintained in a dischargeable state, the **next** discharge skill deals extra area damage equal to **106%**/122%/140%/160% of ATK for **1** time in a 5-meter radius, up to **530%**/610%/700%/800%. In addition, increase shatter by **7%**/14%/21%/28% for **4** seconds. This effect does not stack. This set effect works in the off-hand slot, but only the set with the highest star rating will take effect.

matrix_SSR14_1.name: Nemesis
matrix_SSR14_1.description: More than half of the hull has been replaced. I wonder if there is a way to measure the proportion of souls?

set.2: When a target is being healed, their volt ATK is increased by **8%**/10%/12%/15% for **20** seconds. This effect does not stack, and only the highest level's effect is applied when obtained repeatedly.
set.4: When healing yourself or your Electrode, the target of healing gains a charge of "Lightning." The next attack within **30** seconds will cast Lightning, dealing volt damage equal to **240%**/300%/360%/420% of volt ATK on the first target hit, and damage caused by Electrodes is reduced by 50%. Cannot be triggered more than once in **10** seconds. "Lightning" charges do not stack. Only the highest level's effect is applied when obtained repeatedly.

matrix_SSR15_1.name: Frigg
matrix_SSR15_1.description: I will cut off your greed for the forbidden things.

set.2: Increase frost ATK by **8%**/10%/12%/15% for **10** seconds when switching between frost weapons. This set effect works in the off-hand slot, but only the set with the highest star rating will take effect.
set.4: When unleashing a Frost Domain with the weapon "Balmung," enemies within the Frost Domain receive frost damage equal to **55%**/65%/75%/85% of ATK every second.

matrix_SSR16_1.name: Ruby
matrix_SSR16_1.description: This delicate bud is always carefully protected, but she also wants to walk to the frontline and be side by side with her, even if she needs to stand on her tiptoes.

set.2: Increases flame ATK after casting weapon skill by **8%**/10%/12%/15% for **25** seconds. If multiple star rating effects are triggered, the one triggered last prevails. This effect does not stack.
set.4: Grant Mastery after casting weapon skill for **15** seconds, with a cooldown of **15** seconds (Mastery shares cooldowns across levels). Mastery is not stackable. Increases flame damage by **2%**/2.5%/3%/3.5% every time the target is hit with a normal attack until the end of Mastery, adding a maximum of **1** stack every **0.2** seconds, up to **6** stacks. After **6** stacks, gain a shield that can block damage **1** time.

set.2: When Frost Resonance gets triggered: Every **0** seconds, deal frost damage equal to **65%**/80%/95%/110% of frost ATK to enemies within a 10-meter radius and apply the Icefrost effect: Inflict 500% slow effect that lasts for **1** seconds, freeze targets for **3** seconds after 3 stacks (does not apply to bosses), and increase frost damage taken by the target by **5%** for **5** seconds. This Matrix's effect is also active in the off-hand slot, but only the set with the highest star rating will take effect.
set.4: Attack the target **10** times to inflict a {0-second Flashfreeze mark. Flashfreeze: Increase frost damage dealt to the marked target by **11%**/13%/15%/17%. This Matrix's effect is also active in the off-hand slot, but only the set with the highest star rating will take effect.

matrix_SSR18_1.name: Lin
matrix_SSR18_1.description: Responsibility that comes with identity, a burden and a trial.

set.2: Increase ATK by **2.1%**/2.6%/3.1%/3.6% on hit for 18 seconds, stacking up to 5 times. Only the highest level is effective when effects are duplicated.
set.4: Every 5m traveled within Moonlight Realm grants 1 stack of Moonlight, increasing final damage by **4%**/4.9%/5.8%/6.7% for 15 seconds, stacking up to 3 times. This Matrix's effect is also active in the off-hand slot, but only the set with the highest star rating will take effect.

set.2: Use this weapon to increase all attack types by **13%**/17%/21%/25%. The lower the HP, the higher the healing received, which can be increased by up to **100%**.
set.4: When dealing physical damage, increase physical damage by **2.7%** with a cooldown of **0.1** seconds. Stack up to **5** times. Upon reaching the maximum stacks, increase physical damage by an additional **3.5%**/7%/10.5%/14% for **5** seconds. Only the effect with the highest star rating is applied when obtained repeatedly. Obtain 1 block for each dodge, blocking damage up to **60%** of current HP, but not less than **20%** of Max HP. Stack up to **3** blocks for **7 seconds**.

matrix_SSR20_1.name: Tian Lang
matrix_SSR20_1.description: If he was born in ancient times, he might have been a great general defending his land.

set.2: Every time volt damage is dealt, there is a **40%** chance of triggering chain lightning, dealing damage equal to **50%**/65%/90%/120% of volt ATK to up to **7** targets. Cooldown: **2** seconds. Every time chain lightning is triggered, increase volt damage by **6%** for **6** seconds (chain lightning will not trigger attack effects). This effect cannot be stacked. This Matrix's effect is also active in the off-hand slot, but only the set with the highest star rating will take effect.
set.4: Every time a volt weapon's skill or discharge skill is used, increase volt damage by **12%**/14%/16%/18% for **15** seconds. This effect cannot be stacked. This Matrix's effect is also active in the off-hand slot, but only the set with the highest star rating will take effect.

set.2: Increase final damage by **3%**/3.4%/3.8%/4.2% and final crit rate by **2%**/2%/2.4%/2.4% for **25** seconds when hitting a target with a flame weapon, stacking up to **2** times. Only the effect with the highest star rating is applied when obtained repeatedly.
set.4: When equipping 2 or more flame weapons, gain Flowing Fire, which increases final damage by **7%**/8%/9%/10%, and increases crit damage by an additional **12%**/14%/16%/18% for **25** seconds after landing a critical hit. For every **3** charged attacks that hit the target, restore **1** dodge attempt. Cooldown: **2** seconds. Only the effect with the highest star rating is applied when obtained repeatedly.

set.2: Increase final damage by **4.5%**/5.5%/6.5%/7.5% every time you switch to this weapon. Increase frost damage by an additional **3%** for **5** seconds if it's a frost weapon. Only the set with the highest star rating will take effect.
set.4: Increase final damage by **6%**/7.5%/9%/10.5% for **4** seconds every time you use Unyielding Wing's discharge skill, stacking up to **2** times. Remove **1** stack when the duration ends. This set effect works in the off-hand slot and the same Matrix's effect cannot be stacked repeatedly. Endurance consumption in the Latent State is reduced by **50%**.

matrix_SSR23_1.name: Umi
matrix_SSR23_1.description: Slowly and patiently guide the audience and self into the magic illusion.

set.2: When dealing physical damage, increase final damage by **4%**/5%/6%/7% and physical damage by an additional **2%**/2.5%/3%/3.5% for **8** seconds. This Matrix's effect is also active in the off-hand slot, but only the set with the highest star rating will take effect.
set.4: When equipping **2** or more physical weapons, increase final damage by **15%**/17%/19%/21%. This Matrix's effect is also active in the off-hand slot, but only the set with the highest star rating will take effect.

matrix_SSR24_1.name: Fenrir
matrix_SSR24_1.description: I dream of chocolate. Can I believe that this is real?

set.2: Increase crit damage by **14%**/15%/16%/18%. This effect does not stack. This Matrix's effect is also active in the off-hand slot, but only the set with the highest star rating will take effect.
set.4: When dealing volt damage, increase final damage by **2.75%** for **10** seconds, stacking up to **5**/6/7/8 times. This Matrix's effect is also active in the off-hand slot, but only the set with the highest star rating will take effect.

set.2: Equipping this matrix on the current weapon increases final damage by **8.5%**/10.5%/12.5%/14.5%.
set.4: Increase final damage by **9%**/11%/13%/15%. The effect is also active in the off-hand slot, but only the set with the highest star rating will take effect.

matrix_SSR26_1.name: Scylla
matrix_SSR26_1.description: The barbaric gesture doesn't match its elegant appearance.

set.2: Equipping this matrix on the current weapon increases crit damage by **13%**/16%/19%/23% and shatter by **13%**/16%/19%/23%.
set.4: Equipping 2 or more weapons of different elements or types increases all elemental damage by **9.5%**/11.5%/13.5%/15.5%. The effect is also active in the off-hand slot, but only the set with the highest star rating will take effect.

matrix_SSR27_1.name: Lan
matrix_SSR27_1.description: She often explores dangerous situations by herself.

set.2: When equipped with at least 1 flame weapon, increase flame ATK by **6%**/7%/8%/9% and flame damage by **3.2%**/3.8%/4.4%/5%. This set effect works in the off-hand slot, and only the set with the highest star rating will take effect.
set.4: Gain different effects based on the number of different elemental weapons equipped: Increase flame/frost/physical/volt damage by **4%**/5%/6%/7% for every flame/frost/physical/volt weapon equipped. Increase final damage by **5%**/6%/7%/8% for every altered weapon equipped. This set effect works in the off-hand slot, and only the set with the highest star rating will take effect.

matrix_SSR28_1.name: Icarus
matrix_SSR28_1.description: Strategies and plans. My fate lies in my hands.

set.2: Equipping Precious One, **2** or more weapons of different elements, or **2** or more types of weapons increases all elemental damage by **8%**/9%/10%/11%. This set effect works in the off-hand slot, and only the set with the highest star rating will take effect.
set.4: When dealing frost damage, increase all elemental damage by **13%**/16%/19%/22% for **4** seconds. This set effect works in the off-hand slot, and only the set with the highest star rating will take effect.

matrix_SSR29_1.name: Fiona
matrix_SSR29_1.description: A powerful Executor and an outstanding Archon.

set.2: After dealing damage, increase attack by **16%**/18%/20%/22% for {4 seconds. This effect does not stack. Only the effect with the highest star rating is applied when obtained repeatedly.
set.4: While Benediction Resonance is not active, after using Scatter Technique, increase final damage by **17%**/19%/21%/23% for {4 seconds. While Benediction Resonance is active, after using Scatter Technique, increase final damage for self and teammates by **8.5%**/9.5%/10.5%/11.5% for {9 seconds. Final damage is additionally increased based on base attack by (Base ATK/10,000)%, up to 5%. This Matrix's effect is also active in the off-hand slot, but only the set with the highest star rating will take effect.

matrix_SSR30_1.name: Gnonno
matrix_SSR30_1.description: Tragedy is born from impulsive, risky decisions.

set.2: Increase all elemental damage by **8%**/9%/10%/11% when at least 1 physical weapon is equipped. This set effect works in the off-hand slot, and only the set with the highest star rating will take effect.
set.4: After using any physical weapon skill or discharge skill, increase all elemental damage by **13%**/16%/19%/22% for **25** seconds. Endurance consumed when using **Mini Hurricane** is reduced by **40%**. This set effect works in the off-hand slot, and only the set with the highest star rating will take effect.

matrix_SSR31_1.name: Rubilia
matrix_SSR31_1.description: She is hesitant, yet still clings to the darkest of hopes.

set.2: Increase volt ATK by **14.5%**/16.5%/18.5%/20.5%. This set effect works in the off-hand slot, and only the set with the highest star rating will take effect.
set.4: Increase Crystamax thorn limit to **6**. After landing a hit with a volt weapon, all elemental damage is increased by **13%**/16%/19%/22% for **4** seconds. This set effect works in the off-hand slot, and only the set with the highest star rating will take effect.

matrix_SSR32_1.name: Liu Huo
matrix_SSR32_1.description: In the vast expanse of poetic art, my love for literacy halted just before the covers' part...

set.2: Increase final damage by **9%**/10%/11%/12%. The number of **Sparrow Feathers** obtained from dodging while using **Pine Comet** increases to **20**. This set effect works in the off-hand slot, and only the set with the highest star rating will take effect.
set.4: When equipped with at least **1** flame weapon, increase all elemental damage by **11%**/14%/17%/20%. After using **In All Directions**, increase all elemental damage boost by an additional **7%** and gradually reduce to **4%** over **5** seconds. This set effect works in the off-hand slot, and only the set with the highest star rating will take effect.

matrix_SSR33_1.name: Yu Lan
matrix_SSR33_1.description: Stay true and sincere, pure and natural.

set.2: When equipped with at least **1** frost weapon, while in the combat state, deal damage equal to **85%** of ATK to nearby targets every second. After using any frost weapon skill or discharge skill, increase final damage by **7%**/8%/9%/10% for **5** seconds. This set effect works in the off-hand slot, and only the set with the highest star rating will take effect.
set.4: After **Unity** consumes **Internal Strength** or **Fighting Spirit**, increase final damage by **6%** for **1** seconds. After dealing frost damage, increase all elemental damage by **12%**/15%/19%/23% for **6** seconds. This set effect works in the off-hand slot, and only the set with the highest star rating will take effect.

matrix_SSR34_1.name: Ming Jing
matrix_SSR34_1.description: Deep thoughts buried within a strong fragrance.

set.2: Increase Serpent Chain member limit to **5**. When at least **1** physical or flame weapon is equipped, increase physical ATK and flame ATK by **14%**/16%/18%/20%. This set effect works in the off-hand slot, and only the set with the highest star rating will take effect.
set.4: After applying the snake bite effect, increase physical ATK and flame ATK by **9%** for **1** seconds. While in the combat state, increase final damage by **14%**/17%/20%/23%. This set effect works in the off-hand slot, and only the set with the highest star rating will take effect.

matrix_SSR35_1.name: Huang
matrix_SSR35_1.description: The fate of all the world is connected to me.

set.2: Increase final damage by **7%**/8%/9%/10%. After Azura's shockwave lands a hit, increase skill damage by **15%** for **5** seconds. This set effect works in the off-hand slot, and only the set with the highest star rating will take effect.
set.4: When equipped with at least **1** volt weapon, increase all elemental damage by **14%**/17%/20%/23%. After using **Azure Moon** / **Soaring Dragon**, increase crit damage by **6%** for **5** seconds. This set effect works in the off-hand slot, and only the set with the highest star rating will take effect.

matrix_SSR36_1.name: Fei Se
matrix_SSR36_1.description: She's hard to pin down, but the moment you wish to see her, she gracefully appears.

set.2: After using any flame weapon skill or discharge, increase all attack by **14%**/16%/18%/20% for **4** seconds. This set effect works in the off-hand slot. Only the set with the highest star rating will take effect.
set.4: When equipped with at least **1** flame weapon, increase all elemental damage by **14%**/17%/20%/23%. After creating Fei Se's Phantasia, additionally increase final damage by **9%** for **5** seconds. This set effect works in the off-hand slot. Only the set with the highest star rating will take effect.

matrix_SSR37_1.name: Ling Han
matrix_SSR37_1.description: The sword is like a mist, traveling swiftly and indiscriminately.

set.2: Increase all elemental damage by **7%**/8%/9%/10%. When firing Frost Blades, deal additional damage equal to **416%** of ATK to nearby targets. This set effect works in the off-hand slot, and only the set with the highest star rating will take effect.
set.4: After using any frost weapon's discharge skill, increase final damage by **12%**/15%/19%/23% for **4** seconds. When **Alabaster Tiger** is equipped, increase all attack by **12%**. This set effect works in the off-hand slot, and only the set with the highest star rating will take effect.
